page.title: 03MY FAMILY
page.content: I live with my family in Haugh of Urr. We moved here recently and I think it is a nice area. We had lived in Sandbach, Cheshire but wanted to live in the country. My sister Wendy, who is 17, was doing her 'O Levels' and we had to wait until she had sat them before moving. My dad still works there so he is away four or five days a week. My mum used to work for 'Rank Hovis McDougall' but now she works with the 'Bradford and Bingley Building Society' in Castle Douglas. My Gran and Auntie Nett live with us, they do the housework. I have a dog called Bruce, he is a Red Setter and he is cute.
